tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties

title: Your personal data is given to third parties
quoteText: Business Partners. We may share Personal Information with our business partners, and affiliates for our and our affiliatesâ€™ internal business purposes or to provide you with a product or service that you have requested. We may also provide Personal Information to business partners with whom we may jointly offer products or services, or whose products or services we believe may be of interest to you.
